feature.name: hawtio
feature.details: Installs the main hawtio war file, an MBean helper for OSGi and an MBean helper to get JSON Schema out of Java objects

feature.name: hawtio-maven-indexer
feature.details: Installs the hawtio maven indexer service as a separate bundle

feature.name: hawtio-git
feature.details: Installs the hawtio git service as a separate bundle

feature.name: hawtio-dev-mode
feature.details: Adds the hawtio plugin registry and configures the /hawtio-dev context to be served out from the hawtio-web target directory allowing easy development of hawtio while it's running in a real osgi container. Install jolokia if it's not installed. Also add org.jolokia.agentContext=/hawtio/jolokia to etc/system.properties so jolokia is installed at the right context

feature.name: hawtio-plugin-example
feature.details: A simple example plugin for hawtio
